message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd be really interested in. It's worth at least $120 to you, so I'm offering it to you for $100. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80

Bob, I appreciate your interest. I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $80 is simply too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $90? That's still a good value for you considering the product is worth $120 to you.
I'm not sure I can go any higher than $80, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $85
